update loan
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
limit_min = #{limitMin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
limit_max = #{limitMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
money_rate = #{moneyRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_employ = #{isEmploy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update loan set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, limit_min = #{limitMin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, limit_max = #{limitMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, money_rate = #{moneyRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_employ = #{isEmploy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
